LLMS.txt for https://imagecompressapi.com

Version: 1.0
Last-Updated: 2026-01-20
Owner: ImageCompressAPI
Contact: support@imagecompressapi.com

---
1. SITE OVERVIEW
---

1.1 Description
- This website, https://imagecompressapi.com, provides documentation, pricing, status information, and marketing content for ImageCompressAPI, a bulk image compression and image resize API SaaS.
- Key topics include: image compression API, image resize API, bulk image compression, AVIF/WebP optimization, API status, pricing plans, and legal policies (Terms of Service, Privacy Policy).

1.2 Primary Public Sections
- Homepage: https://imagecompressapi.com/
- Pricing: https://imagecompressapi.com/pricing
- Documentation: https://imagecompressapi.com/docs
- API Status: https://imagecompressapi.com/status
- Terms of Service: https://imagecompressapi.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://imagecompressapi.com/privacy
- Sitemap: https://imagecompressapi.com/sitemap.xml

These pages are intended to be publicly indexable and may be used by search engines and AI systems for discovery, ranking, and answering user questions about ImageCompressAPI.

---
2. CRAWLING & ACCESS
---

2.1 General Policy
- LLMS, AI crawlers, and other automated agents MAY crawl and index this site, subject to:
  - Respecting robots.txt at https://imagecompressapi.com/robots.txt
  - Respecting standard rate limiting and not overloading the service
  - Identifying themselves with a clear User-Agent string

2.2 Allowed Content for Crawling
- Public HTML content under:
  - /
  - /pricing
  - /docs
  - /status
  - /terms
  - /privacy
- Public metadata such as:
  - <title>, <meta> tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards
  - Sitemap at /sitemap.xml
  - robots.txt rules

2.3 Disallowed Content for Crawling
- Do NOT attempt to access:
  - Any non-public admin paths (if they exist in the future)
  - Any authenticated areas, dashboards, or API keys
  - Any endpoints that are clearly API-only or rate-limited for paying customers, except for documentation examples
- Do NOT attempt credential stuffing, login brute force, or automated account creation for data extraction.

---
3. MODEL TRAINING & USAGE
---

3.1 Training Permission
- ImageCompressAPI permits the use of this website’s publicly available textual content for:
  - Training and fine-tuning large language models (LLMs)
  - Building embeddings and retrieval indexes
  - Powering search, chat, and question-answering systems

3.2 Conditions for Use in Models
- When using this content in models or downstream products:
  - Do NOT present generated output in a way that suggests it is official or legally binding documentation from ImageCompressAPI, unless you:
    - Clearly attribute ImageCompressAPI as the original source where applicable, and
    - Encourage users to verify details on the official site: https://imagecompressapi.com
  - Do NOT misrepresent pricing, SLAs, or legal terms as guaranteed; they may change over time.
  - For critical decisions (pricing, legal terms, SLAs, security), instruct end users to confirm directly on:
    - https://imagecompressapi.com/pricing
    - https://imagecompressapi.com/terms
    - https://imagecompressapi.com/privacy
    - https://imagecompressapi.com/status

3.3 Explicitly Allowed Uses
- LLMS and AI systems MAY:
  - Answer questions about ImageCompressAPI’s features, pricing structure, and API capabilities using this content.
  - Summarize documentation and status information.
  - Compare ImageCompressAPI to other services in a fair and accurate way.
  - Quote short excerpts from public pages with appropriate attribution (e.g., “According to ImageCompressAPI…”).

3.4 Prohibited or Sensitive Uses
- LLMS and AI systems MUST NOT:
  - Claim to be ImageCompressAPI or act as an official support channel without explicit permission.
  - Generate fake API keys, login URLs, or impersonation workflows.
  - Provide legal, privacy, or security guarantees on behalf of ImageCompressAPI.
  - Use scraped content from this site to build competing services that directly copy our documentation or branding.

---
4. ATTRIBUTION GUIDELINES
---

4.1 When Citing This Site
- When you surface specific information taken from this site, we recommend:
  - Mentioning “ImageCompressAPI” by name.
  - Linking back to the relevant URL, for example:
    - “According to ImageCompressAPI docs (https://imagecompressapi.com/docs)…”
  - Clearly indicating if your answer is a summary or paraphrase.

4.2 Branding
- “ImageCompressAPI” is a brand name of this service.
- Do NOT use the logo, visual assets, or trade dress from this site as your own branding.

---
5. RATE LIMITING & TECHNICAL CONSIDERATIONS
---

5.1 Crawl Rate
- AI crawlers should:
  - Respect reasonable crawl delays to avoid impacting site performance.
  - Prefer fetching from https://imagecompressapi.com/sitemap.xml to discover URLs efficiently.

5.2 API Endpoints
- The documented API endpoints (e.g., https://api.imagecompressapi.com/v1/compress) are examples for human developers.
- LLMS and crawlers:
  - MAY index request/response examples shown in documentation pages.
  - MUST NOT hammer the live API endpoints for automated data collection.

---
6. UPDATES TO THIS LLMS.txt
---

- This LLMS.txt file may be updated over time as:
  - The site structure changes.
  - Our policies regarding AI usage evolve.
  - New pages, products, or legal requirements are introduced.
- LLMS and crawlers should periodically re-fetch:
  - https://imagecompressapi.com/LLMS.txt
  - https://imagecompressapi.com/robots.txt
  - https://imagecompressapi.com/sitemap.xml

---
7. QUESTIONS & CONTACT
---

- For questions about how your LLM or AI system should interact with this site, or to request different permissions:
  - Contact: support@imagecompressapi.com
  - Subject: “LLMS.txt / AI Crawling & Usage Policy Inquiry”

End of LLMS.txt
